articles.title: NDC Urges S. Korean Authorities to Actively Respond to DPRK's Proposal
articles.content:
NDC Urges S. Korean Authorities to Actively Respond to DPRK's Proposal
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK in an open letter on Friday said that its proposal for the north-south military authorities' talks is the best and greatest realistic way for ensuring peace of the country and the security of the nation.
					 The letter went on:
					
					 But the south Korean authorities categorically denied the DPRK's proposal for the military authorities' talks, terming it "propaganda offensive bereft of sincerity" and "camouflaged peace tactics". They went the lengths of crying out for "strong counteraction" while talking about such unreasonable logic as "denuclearization first and dialogue next".
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK solemnly urged the south Korean authorities as follows to put under control the prevailing catastrophic situation created in the north-south relations through dialogue and negotiations:
					
					 1. The south Korean authorities should immediately respond to the DPRK's proposal for jointly paving the way for ending all the hostile acts, stumbling blocks lying in the way of fostering mistrust and confrontation and hindering the improvement of relations between the north and the south, and for building military confidence.
					
					 All kinds of hostile acts rattling the nerves of the opposite side and slandering it including psychological broadcasting and leaflet-scattering operations being waged in frontline areas are by no means unrelated to the responsibilities of the military authorities of both sides.
					
					 The continued grim situation under which both sides level their guns at each other with the Military Demarcation Line imposed by outside forces and the hotspot waters in the West Sea in between would inevitably lead to armed conflict and the outbreak of a war.
					
					 Fostering trust and dialogue, not mistrust and confrontation, is the the best way and urgent and pressing task for paving a wide avenue to peace and prosperity under the touch-and-go situation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly bear in mind that the prospect for improving the north-south relations can be opened only through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 2. The south Korean authorities should positively respond to the DPRK's proposal for opening bilateral military dialogue at the earliest date for settling all the problems arising in easing military tension on the Korean peninsula and improving the north-south relations.
					
					 Army, be it in the north or the south, has the mission to safeguard the peace and security of our country and nation.
					
					 It is the responsibility and duty of the military authorities in all aspects to remove the danger of a war and defuse tension on this land.
					
					 It is neither possible to achieve peace through the recourse to arms nor possible to ensure security through mud-slinging and hostility.
					
					 It is for this reason that we wish to put all matters of concern on the military negotiating table and settle them through frank discussion.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to clearly understand that they can not have any reason or pretext to deny this if they have intent to improve the present north-south relations.
					
					 3. The south Korean authorities should meet the great expectation of all Koreans by actively supporting the bold and practical measures that would help ensure peace of the country and the security of the nation.
					
					 Now is the time when a single action speaks louder than hundreds of words.
					
					 No matter how dear peace may be, talking is not enough to ensure it. The nation may be get inveigled in the whirlwind of war and suffer from a horrible disaster in the end.
					
					 It is necessary to decisively break with the inglorious past and make a fresh start.
					
					 The north and the south should join hands and take a giant stride forward to defuse military tension and the danger of conflict on the Korean peninsula and to open a new chapter for the improvement of the north-south relations and for the movement for national reunification.
					
					 There is nothing to be afraid of and nothing impossible if all members of the resourceful and homogeneous Korean nation pool their intention and efforts.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave with discretion as members of the Korean nation, not misjudging the warm sincerity and great magnanimity of the DPRK.
					
					 All the Koreans will soon be able to see bold and practical measures to be taken by the DPRK to defuse confrontation and the danger of conflict on the Korean peninsula and achieve the sacred cause of national reunification, the most cherished desire of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Malabo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Malabo
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, arrived in Malabo, Thursday to take part in the inaugural ceremony of the president of Equatorial Guinea and pay an official visit to it.
					 Arriving together with him were Sin Hong Chol, vice minister of Foreign Affairs, and other suite members.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam was greeted by Prime Minister Vicente Ehate Tomi, vice-ministers, the minister of Defense, minister of Security, and other high-ranking officials of Equatorial Guinea and the charge d'affaires ad interim of the DPRK in Malabo.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam headed for the lodging quarters, escorted by motorcycles.

articles.title: 7th Congress of WPK Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
7th Congress of WPK Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place at the DPRK missions abroad on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included receptions, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in the DPRK embassies in China, Vietnam, Mongolia, Nepal, Singapore, Iran, Cambodia, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Britain, Italy, the Czech Republic, Poland, Guinea, DR Congo, Nigeria, Egypt, Ethiopia, Senegal, Mexico and Peru and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva from May 10 to 16.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference expressed belief that the Korean people would continue registering fresh and bigger successes in building a thriving socialist nation, united close around the WPK headed by Chairman Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vice-director of the Department for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam noted that the 7th Congress of the WPK would mark a milestone of new victory in the Korean people's drive for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) who doubles as deputy prime minister and minister for Women, Children and Social Welfare of Nepal extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that it is the great honor to award the title of the honorary leader of their party to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The general secretary of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and the general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said that the Korean people would make great progress in their anti-imperialist struggle, socialist construction and accomplishment of the cause of national reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party-21 of the Czech Republic praised the WPK as the powerful party victoriously advancing the cause of socialism in the world today when the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. and western countries are rampant.
					
					 The general secretary of the Communist Party of DR Congo said that the successes and experience gained by the WPK serve as a precious textbook for his party.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies Abroad
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies Abroad
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Government ministries, political parties, organization delegation and personages of different countries visited the DPRK embassies in their countries from May 9 to 13, congratulating supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among them were the Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba, the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia, the Football Association of the Army of the Kingdom of Cambodia, a delegation of the Taekwon-Do Association of Cambodia, the general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, the general secretary of the Communist Party of DR Congo, the chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, the general secretary of the  Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, a secretary of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, chairman of
					
					 the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, the chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, the vice-president of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and the chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the pictures portraying President Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The co-chairman of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, the president of the "C. I. S. Estero" Group of Italy, the secretary general of the China Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission, the chairperson of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China and the general manger of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong, China sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in their countries on the same occasion.

articles.title: Greetings to Cameroonian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Cameroonian President
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Paul Biya, president of the Republic of Cameroon, on Friday on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of its founding.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president of Cameroon good health and happiness and its people prosperity.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Personages
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with gifts by personages of Russia, Angola and Singapore to congratulate Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Mikhail Serzhuk, deputy to the State Duma of Russia from "A Just Russia", and Antonio Domingos Peliganga, representative of the Malange Provincial Church of Angola, on May 11 and 16 separately handed the gifts to the DPRK charge d' affaires ad interim and an official concerned working in the relevant countries.
					
					 Meanwhile, Aram Pan, a photographer of Singapore, on May 1 conveyed a gift to an official of the DPRK mission in the country on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Leaves
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Leaves
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo left here Friday.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Celebrate Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Celebrate Seventh Congress of WPK
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- There took place mass rallies in the cities and counties to celebrate the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were officials, working people, youths and students of the party, power and economic bodies, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities in the cities and counties.
					
					 The speakers at the mass rallies extended the greatest honor and congratulations to supreme leader Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 They said that the Seventh Congress of the WPK was a great meeting of victory and honor which marked a turning point in the struggle to consolidate the WPK and accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 They noted Kim Jong Un's report served as a great programme in which he unrolled a bright future for building a socialist power and a banner of struggle which arouse the servicepersons and people to the general offensive for the building of a socialist power.
					
					 They stressed the need for all sectors and units to harden the successes at the 70-day campaign and make fresh eye-opening successes in the Mallima era through uninterrupted innovation, progress and offensive in the attack spirit of the WPK, on the self-development-first principle and by dint of science and technology.
					
					 They called for working fresh miracles and feats in the struggle to carry out the tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress to make contribution to hastening the building of a socialist power in close unity around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: 2016 Spring Table-Tennis Tournament for Disabled and Amateurs
articles.content:
2016 Spring Table-Tennis Tournament for Disabled and Amateurs
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The 2016 Spring Table-Tennis Tournament for Disabled and Amateurs took place at the gymnasium of Kim Chaek University of Technology from May 16 to 20. 
					 The tournament brought together hundreds of the disabled and amateurs, members of the International Para-Olympic Committee, a member of ITTF and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 Divided into groups of disabled and amateurs of different ages, they competed in singles and doubles.
					
					 In the disabled group Kim Yong Rok came first in singles while Jon Ju Hyon and Jon Jong Ho finished first in the doubles played by the disabled and amateurs in pair.

articles.title: Anniversary of Ground-breaking for Pothong River Improvement Project Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Ground-breaking for Pothong River Improvement Project Observed
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place before the Monument to the Pothong River Improvement Project on Friday to mark the 70th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's ground breaking for the grand nature-remaking project.
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin made a report.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung who initiated the Pothong River improvement project right after the country's liberation delivered a speech at a ground-breaking ceremony on May 21, Juche 35 (1946) and personally broke the ground for the grand nature-remaking project.
					
					 He said:
					
					 In hearty response to the speech of Kim Il Sung the people launched the drive with patriotism and thus worked such an epoch-making miracle as finishing the project in a matter of just 55 days.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung, the country turned into a people's paradise good to live in and work after erasing the traces of debris and destruction left by the colonial society and grim war.
					
					 The historic cause of the grand nature-harnessing was successfully carried forward and developed at a fresh high stage under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un set it as the general orientation and general task to be carried out in the field of land management to radically change the appearance of the country's land as required by a thriving socialist nation and is wisely leading the drive for doing so.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the people to more dynamically conduct the grand nature-remaking project in hearty response to Kim Jong Un's plan for land development and bring about a revolutionary turn in the land management.

articles.title: Peruvian Senior Media Man Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Peruvian Senior Media Man Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Abraham Ramirez Lituma, director general and editor-in-chief of the Peruvian newspaper El Callao, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He looked round historical relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae with much care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his revolutionary family.
					
					 He also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, Monument to Party Founding, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, etc.

articles.title: Spring Mingyuegou Meeting, Historic Event in Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Spring Mingyuegou Meeting, Historic Event in Korean Revolution
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- It has been 85 years after the Spring Mingyuegou Meeting was held in the period of anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					 The meeting was convened in May Juche 20 (1931) to eradicate the harmful aftereffects of the failed "Left" adventurist uprising by factionalists imbued with flunkeyism and hasten on a full scale the preparations for armed struggle against the Japanese imperialist aggressors by closely rallying the revolutionary forces.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung called a meeting of cadres of the party and the Young Communist League at Mingyuegou, Yanji County of China, and made a historic speech "Let Us Repudiate the 'Left' Adventurist Line and Follow the Revolutionary Organizational Line".
					
					 In his speech he analyzed and reviewed the true nature of the May 30 Uprising and put forward the revolutionary organizational line of uniting the whole Korean nation into a political force by firmly rallying the masses of workers, peasants and intellectuals and banding together the anti-Japanese forces of all other social sections around them.
					
					 He indicated the tasks for building up a hard core of leadership and enhancing its independent role, restoring and consolidating the ruined mass organizations and enlisting people from all walks of life in them and tempering the masses in the practical struggle.
					
					 His speech garnered absolute support from all the participants in the meeting, who accepted it as a guiding principle for bringing over large masses of people.
					
					 Since then, many revolutionary organizations were restored rapidly and went into active operation.
					
					 Thanks to such precious exploits and tradition made during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the Korean army and people could fully display the might of their single-minded unity around the Party and the leader in each period and at every stage of the developing revolution.

articles.title: Guidelines for Socialist Architecture
articles.content:
Guidelines for Socialist Architecture
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Twenty-five years has passed since leader Kim Jong Il made public his famous work "On Architecture" on May 21, Juche 80 (1991), to provide the guidelines for developing architecture under socialism. 
					 On the scientific analysis of the relations between the architecture and society, the architecture and mankind, Kim Jong Il in the work expounded the essence, characteristics and mission of socialist architecture, the position and role of architecture in social development and the fundamentals in socialist architecture.
					
					 In particular, he formulated architecture as a composite art and pointed out in detail the orientation and ways for ensuring the architectural formative art on a high level. 
					
					 The work has served as a theoretical and practical guide in developing architecture to gratify the interests and demands of the popular masses as well as the basic principles which systematized in an overall way all problems arising in socialist architecture.
					
					 With the guidelines, the Korean army and people had built many edifices across the country even under the grave situation in which they had to stand in confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces. Those edifices include large hydro-power stations built in Anbyon, Thaechon and Huichon.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's idea on Juche-based architecture is now successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, and the architecture in the DPRK serves entirely for the promotion of the people's wellbeing.

articles.title: Chairmen of Chongryon Headquarters Support Reunification Line and Policies Set Forth at 7th Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Chairmen of Chongryon Headquarters Support Reunification Line and Policies Set Forth at 7th Congress of WPK
Tokyo, May 19 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairmen of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on May 18 in support of the policies for national reunification advanced at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among them were Kim Chun Gwon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters; Jon To Hyon, chairman of the Miyagi Prefectural Headquarters; Ri Thae Hyong, chairman of the Hiroshima Prefectural Headquarters; Pak Chol, chairman of the Yamaguchi Prefectural Headquarters; Pak Sun Ho, chairman of the Ehime Prefectural Headquarters; and Ri Ju Hak, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters.
					
					 They said in their statements that at the Party Congress Marshal Kim Jong Un set forth the important guidelines indicating the most just way for accomplishing the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 They underlined the need to turn out in the struggle for building a dignified, prosperous and reunified power in the homeland.
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to take a responsible option and properly behave on the crossroads for bringing earlier the national reunification by concerted efforts and wisdom of the Koreans, not leaving the issue of reunification, the internal one of the nation, to the tender mercy of the foreign forces and persisting in anti-reunification acts while clinging to cooperation with outsiders.
					
					 They vowed to implement the line and policies for national reunification and positively support the struggle of the compatriots in south Korea for improving the north-south relations and reunifying the country.
					
					 They called upon the south Korean authorities to abandon their confrontational attitude, remove legal and institutional mechanisms against reunification, take practical measures for defusing the military tension and conflict, respect the agreements common to the nation and consistently implement them.
					
					 They said that they would devote their efforts and enthusiasm to the struggle for meeting all challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad, ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and realizing reunification by federal formula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Performing Feats in Accomplishing Cause of Global Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for Performing Feats in Accomplishing Cause of Global Independence
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the DPRK, worked heart and soul for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and performed the greatest exploits which no other great man in the world could ever do, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were the peerlessly great men who protected peace and security in Northeast Asia and other parts of the world and the cause of human independence by providing Songun revolutionary leadership, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 After clarifying the revolutionary truth that one can beat back an armed enemy with arms only, the great leaders waged a strenuous struggle to frustrate the war moves of the U.S.-led imperialists.
					
					 They were prominent leaders who held high the Juche-oriented banner of socialism, proved the truth and advantages of socialism both in theory and practice and put spurs to the world socialist movement in the period of ordeal when it was undergoing a serious frustration.
					
					 Even under the grim circumstances and complicated international situation they conducted principled and energetic external activities to ensure that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) increased the international prestige and influence of the DPRK and wisely led the WPK to play its pioneer's role in the struggle for the cause of human independence.
					
					 The Korean revolution and the cause of global independence developed and advanced under their immortal leadership, following their gigantic footprints.
					
					 The world progressives are, therefore, highly praising them as outstanding leaders and standard-bearers of the cause of global independence.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Criticizes Authorities' Act of Treachery
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Criticizes Authorities' Act of Treachery
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- CBS of south Korea criticized the authorities' act of treachery on May 17.
					 It accused the regime of mulling formally proclaiming the establishment of the "foundation for the victims of comfort women" on June 22 in accordance with the "agreement" with Japan.
					
					 Most of the victims are taking a negative attitude towards the regime's moves to establish the foundation, noting they are sparking social uproar, the media said.
					
					 Public criticism of the "agreement" with Japan on the issue of sexual slavery hasn't subsided due to Japan's insincere attitude and the south Korean authorities' lukewarm approach, the media reported, and added:
					
					 Since the "agreement" was made at the end of last year, there has been an increase in the number of statues of girl sexual slave in south Korea from 31 to 41 and actions to erect more girl statues are becoming brisk in the U.S. and other parts of the world.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Trampling down Workers' Right to Existence
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Trampling down Workers' Right to Existence
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on May 17 denounced the authorities for mercilessly trampling down the workers' right to existence through restructuring.
					 It recalled that a worker hired by the Samsung Heavy Industries as a subcontractor again committed a suicide owing to the restructuring of the shipyard's management.
					
					 The workers society described this incident as a murder by the regime and the Samsung Heavy Industries as they pass the buck for the shipyard's poor management upon the part-time workers and subcontractors and force man-killing restructuring on workers, it held.
					
					 It deployed that such tragedy cannot but go on unless shackling and deformation economic structure remains unchanged.

articles.title: Anniversary of May 18 Popular Uprising Observed in South Korea
articles.content:
Anniversary of May 18 Popular Uprising Observed in South Korea
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- At least ten thousand people held a night vigil on Kumnam Avenue of Kwangju on May 17 for honoring the memory of the martyrs on the 36th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 Testimonies were made by the women who lost their sons and daughters and brothers and sisters in the May 18 popular resistance and witnessed the massacre committed by the Chun Doo Hwan military junta.
					
					 The participants acclaimed the testimonies made by the victims and witnesses and pledged themselves to fight for independence, democracy and national reunification, keeping in mind the spirit of the May 18 uprising.

articles.title: Immoral Conducts Serious at S. Korean Schools
articles.content:
Immoral Conducts Serious at S. Korean Schools
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Immoral conducts are rife at south Korean schools, according to the CBS of south Korea.
					 Boys of a senior high school in Richon, Kyonggi Province beat a teacher with brooms after insulting her in December last year, stunning the people.
					
					 A boy of a secondary school in Pusan insulted a female teacher during lesson.
					
					 Infringement upon the dignity of teachers such as use of bad language, violence and defamation by students and their parents is commonplace and teachers' right is being violated due to students' disorderly use of cell phones at school.
					
					 Consequently, three out of ten teachers wish to leave schools.

articles.title: Successful 7th Congress of WPK Observed by British Newspaper
articles.content:
Successful 7th Congress of WPK Observed by British Newspaper
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The May 14th issue of The New Worker, organ of the New Communist Party of Britain, carried an article titled "Congratulations to the Workers' Party of Korea on its successful 7th Congress" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 It said that the 7th Congress of the WPK which is of historic significance in the development of the Korean revolution closed after successfully finishing its work, adding:
					
					 The 7th Congress of the WPK decided to elect Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK reflecting the unanimous will and desire of all party members, service personnel and people.
					
					 The congress provided another landmark for the Workers' Party, army and people of Korea in their struggle for accomplishing the Juche-oriented cause of socialism uplifting the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Now all members of the Workers' Party, service personnel and people of Korea have turned out as one in the struggle for carrying out the tasks advanced at the 7th Congress of the WPK under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Communists of Britain are extending the greatest glory to Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, who successfully guided the recent party congress.
					
					 Only when the DPRK thoroughly implements the revolutionary line set forth by Kim Jong Un at the congress, it will shed more brilliant rays as the power to be envied by the world in the near future.

articles.title: Foreign Broadcasting Services Air Their Reporters' Impressions of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Broadcasting Services Air Their Reporters' Impressions of DPRK
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign broadcasting services aired their reporters' impressions of the DPRK.
					 The CBC of Canada conveyed its press corps' reports on events which took place in Pyongyang on May 10 as follows:
					
					 The Pyongyang mass rally and public procession took place at Kim Il Sung Square with splendor in the presence of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on May 10 in celebration of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The public procession demonstrated the absolute support for the leader.
					
					 The support for Kim Jong Un was fully displayed at the April 25 House of Culture.
					
					 We covered this historic congress.
					
					 Shouts of "hurrah!" rocked the venue of the congress packed with the participants.
					
					 Kim Jong Un acknowledged their cheers.
					
					 The recent congress fully supported all its agenda items and provided a significant occasion in uniting all the people closer around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Radio Sputnik of Russia conveyed the following impressions given by its reporter Andrei Ivanov under the title of "True picture of the DPRK" on May 12:
					
					 We toured various places in the DPRK.
					
					 We visited the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae and the Pyongyang Metro.
					
					 The metro looked like a palace.
					
					 There are mosaics depicting President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 There are also mosaics truthfully depicting the beautiful appearance of Pyongyang, happy agricultural workers and beautiful landscape of countryside.
					
					 A modern electric car made by the DPRK is under operation.
					
					 Western journalists are not properly reporting about them. There were not a few reporters among them who claimed the DPRK had nothing but the metro and missiles to be proud of.
					
					 This was a very wrong view.
					
					 On the same day, The Nation TV Broadcasting Service of Thailand conveyed an account of the interviews with its advisor and the editor-in-chief, while showing Koreans spending the holiday at the Munsu Water Park and the Rungna People's Pleasure Park as follows:
					
					 Asked about their impressions of the DPRK, the advisor and the editor-in-chief said that Thais' understanding of the DPRK and its reality offered a sharp contrast to what we have seen.  Wherever we went, we saw for ourselves happy and cheerful people.
					
					 Visiting Kim Il Sung University, we realized that the level of Korean students was very higher than that of Thai students. When we asked if their country could overcome the West's sanctions, the students proudly said the reporters could witness for themselves how it stood firm against them. Through dialogues with many people, we were firmly convinced that the DPRK's future was rosy.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Group Formed in South Africa
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Group Formed in South Africa
Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Mfumalanga Provincial Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of South Africa was inaugurated with due ceremony on May 7 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Ambrose Mnisi was elected chairman of the group at the ceremony.
					
					 A congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: CDN demanda a autoridades surcoreanas aceptar propuesta de RPDC
articles.content:
CDN demanda a autoridades surcoreanas aceptar propuesta de RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- En un mensaje abierto emitido el dia 20, el Comite de Defensa Nacional (CDN) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enfatizo que la propuesta de sostener las conversaciones de las autoridades militares Norte-Sur de Corea es el optimo remedio realista por la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion.
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas negaron totalmente esta propuesta calificandola de "ofensiva de propaganda carente de sinceridad" y "tactica disfrazada de paz" y abogaron por el "enfrentamiento riguroso" soltando las palabras ilogicas como "desnuclearizacion primero, dialogo  despues".
					
					Para superar mediante el dialogo y negociaciones la situacion catastrofica actual creada en las relaciones intercoreanas, el CDN de la RPDC demanda con solemnidad a las autoridades surcoreanas como sigue: 
					
					1. Las autoridades surcoreanas han de aceptar sin demora nuestra propuesta de parar todas las acciones hostiles, que fomentan la desconfianza y confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas y estorban la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, y buscar juntos la salida para crear la confianza militar. 
					
					La radiodifusion psicologica, el lanzamiento de volantes y otras acciones hostiles de diferentes tipos que se desarrollan ahora en las inmediaciones del frente incitando y calumniando a la contraparte no son indiferentes con la responsabilidad de las autoridades militares de ambas partes. 
					
					Cuanto mas perdure la situacion critica en que el Norte y el Sur de Corea se enfrentan con armas uno contra otro en ambos lados de la demarcacion militar y la zona candente del Mar Oeste, tanto mas seran inevitables el choque armado y el estallido de guerra.
					
					Crear la confianza y aspirar al dialogo, en lugar de perseguir la desconfianza y la confrontacion, es el optimo remedio y asunto apremiante e impostergable para abrir el ancho camino por la paz y prosperidad en el delicado estado de guerra.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que podemos abrir la perspectiva de las relaciones Norte-Sur solo con el dialogo y negociaciones.
					
					2. Las autoridades surcoreanas deben aceptar nuestra propuesta de reanudar lo mas pronto posible el dialogo de la capa militar de ambas partes para resolver todos los problemas que se presentan en aliviar la tension militar en la Peninsula Coreana y mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					El ejercito, que este en el Norte o en el Sur, tiene la mision de defender la paz y la seguridad de la patria y la nacion. 
					
					Eliminar el peligro de guerra y aliviar la tension en esta tierra patria es el deber de las autoridades militares. 
					
					No se puede lograr la paz con enfrentarse con armas uno contra otro ni preservar la seguridad con las calumnias y la hostilidad. 
					
					Por lo tanto, proponemos discutir con sinceridad y resolver todos los problemas de interes mutuo a traves del dialogo militar. 
					
					Si tienen la voluntad de mejorar las actuales relaciones Norte-Sur, las autoridades surcoreanas deben conocer exactamente que no pueden valerse de una objecion ni una excusa para negarlo.
					
					3. Las autoridades surcoreanas deben corresponder a la gran expectacion de todos los coreanos al unirse activamente con las audaces medidas practicas convenientes al aseguramiento de la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion.
					
					Ahora estamos en el tiempo en que una accion practica es mas apremiante que cien palabras.
					
					Por muy preciosa que sea la paz, no podemos preservarla nunca con unas palabras y al fin sufriremos solo la calamidad tragica al ser arrastrados por el remolino de guerra.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben romper rotundamente con el pasado vergonzoso y hacer una nueva partida.
					
					El Norte y el Sur deben tomar juntos las manos para eliminar la tension militar y el peligro de choque en la Peninsula Coreana y dar un gran paso para abrir nueva fase en la mejora de las relaciones bilaterales y el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Si nosotros, nacion homogenea inteligente, juntamos el proposito y las fuerzas, no hay nada que temer ni el trabajo inconquistable en este mundo.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben juzgar erroneamente nuestra ardiente sinceridad y gran magnanimidad sino portarse sabiamente como miembro de la nacion coreana.
					
					Todos los coreanos veran pronto nuestras audaces medidas practicas para eliminar la confrontacion y el peligro de choque en la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la sagrada causa de la reunificacion de la patria, maximo anhelo de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: En Malabo Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
En Malabo Kim Yong Nam
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, arribo el dia 19 a Malabo para participar en la ceremonia de la toma de posesion del presidente de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial y realizar una visita oficial a este pais africano. 
					Le acompanaron el vicecanciller Sin Hong Chol y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
					
					Kim fue acogido por el premier Vicente Ehate Tomi, los vicepremieres, el ministro de Defensa, el de Seguridad y otros altos funcionarios de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial y el encargado de negocios a.i. de la RPDC en el mismo pais. 
					
					Kim se dirigio a la residencia bajo la escolta de motocicletas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita el dia de fundacion de Republica de Camerun
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita el dia de fundacion de Republica de Camerun
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Camerun, Paul Biya, con motivo del 44o aniversario de la fundacion de ese pais africano.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran sin cesar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y deseo al destinatario buena salud y felicidad y al pueblo de Camerun la prosperidad.

articles.title: Conferencia Primaveral de Mingyuegou
articles.content:
Conferencia Primaveral de Mingyuegou
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- Transcurrieron 85 anos desde cuando se celebro la Conferencia Primaveral de Mingyuegou en el periodo de la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa.
					La conferencia se convoco en mayo del 20 (1931) de la Era Juche con el objetivo de eliminar las consecuencias nocivas causadas por el fraccionalismo servil a las potencias y el oportunismo de izquierda y aglutinar las fuerzas revolucionarias para perfeccionar los preparativos para la lucha armada antijaponesa.
					
					En aquel entonces, hubo varias sublevaciones levantadas por los fraccionalistas serviles a las potencias, debido a las cuales siguieron el terrorismo de los enemigos y quedaron descompuestas casi todas las organizaciones revolucionarias en Jiandao, China.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung convoco en Mingyuegou del distrito de Yenzi la Conferencia de Cuadros del Partido y de la Union de la Juventud Comunista (llamada como Conferencia Primaveral de Mingyuegou) y pronuncio un discurso historico intitulado "Rechacemos la linea del Aventurerismo de izquierda y materialicemos la linea organizativa revolucionaria".
					
					En el conclave, el Presidente analizo en serio la causa del fracaso de la sublevacion del 30 de mayo y su consecuencia nociva. Ademas presento el lineamiento revolucionario de agrupar solidamente a las masas fundamentales de la revolucion y coagular firmemente en torno suyo a las demas fuerzas antijaponesas de diversas clases y capas sociales.
					
					Para este fin, es necesario, apunto, preparar firmemente a los nucleos directivos y elevar su papel independiente.
					
					Ademas, destaco la necesidad de reorganizar y reajustar las organizaciones de masas destruidas.
					
					Por ultimo abogo por incluir a las masas de diversos estratos y forjarlas en la lucha practica.
					
					El discurso fue aplaudido por todos los participantes en la conferencia.
					
					Posteriormente, muchas organizaciones revolucionarias se pusieron en funcionamiento regularmente y libraron sus actividades energicas.
					
					Gracias a tales proezas y tradiciones valiosas del Presidente, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos pudieron poner de pleno manifiesto el poderio de la unidad monolitica ideo-volitiva en torno al lider en cada epoca y etapa de la revolucion en desarrollo tales como el periodo de construccion de nueva patria, la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y la construccion del socialismo.

articles.title: Continuan mitines multitudinarios para festejar VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Continuan mitines multitudinarios para festejar VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en varias ciudades y distritos del pais los mitines multitudinarios para festejar el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Asistieron alli los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de los organismos locales del Partido y el Poder, organos economicos, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades, etc.
					
					Los oradores dedicaron la maxima gloria y las mas calurosas felicitaciones al Mariscal Kim Jong Un elegido como Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					Destacaron que el VII Congreso del PTC fue el conclave de victoria y gloria que marco un nuevo hito en los trabajos para fortalecer el PTC y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche mediante la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo. 
					
					Dijeron que el informe presentado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un sirve del programa inmortal y bandera de lucha que abre una buena perspectiva de la potencia socialista y llama a todos los militares y civiles coreanos a la ofensiva general por la construccion de la potencia prospera socialista. 
					
					Insistieron en que todos los sectores y unidades deben lograr las innovaciones y avance sucesivos consolidando los exitos de la campana de 70 dias, poniendo de manifiesto el espiritu de ataque del PTC y el poderio de las ciencias y tecnicas y manteniendo el principio de dar primacia al autofortalecimiento para asi crear nuevos exitos vertiginosos de la era de Mallima. 
					
					Llamaron a todos a unirse compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y crear nuevos milagros y meritos en la materializacion de las tareas del VII Congreso del PTC para  contribuir al cumplimiento pronto de la causa de construccion de la potencia prospera socialista.
